workHistory.title: Front-End Engineer
accomplishments: Worked heavily with the Quovo API allowing users to connect their bank account within a React web app for fund distribution.

workHistory.title: Front-End Developer
accomplishments: Contributed to a client-side JavaScript library that generated PNG images for printable labels.
Responsible for re-writing and adding various new features to a drag-and-drop label builder using React and Redux.

workHistory.title: Full-Stack Developer
workHistory.description: A review generation system to help local businesses rank higher on Google.
accomplishments: Designed and implemented four unique React apps including a user/admin dashboard, public-facing pages, login and signup forms, and mobile-focused landing pages for collecting customer reviews.
Created an automated web scraper that periodically scrapes new online reviews for each user location.
Created a backend API (Node.js and Express) for interacting with a MySQL database including logic for user management and permissions.

workHistory.title: Software Development Intern
accomplishments: Contributed to an internal user management web app using Angular and Java.

workHistory.title: Web Developer, Graphic Artist
accomplishments: Created a web app in Ruby that scraped company webpages and PDFs to find data inconsistencies.
Wrote scripts for InDesign to automate publishing processes for the marketing team.
